sceneoneA: ???: Interesting, I never really seen a monster like you here before...
???: Wait a second, No way!! Haha, could you really be a human???
???: I have only seen the likes of you in comic books, are you really a human? Or is that just a sick costume you're rockin bro!
???: Anyways judging from your shirt you must be SAM?, the name is Bob, pleasure to make your acquaintance
BOB: Speaking of which, what are you doing here?
sceneoneB: BOB: I know for a fact that if I were in your shoes, I would wanna go home as soon as possible.
BOB: You see but things are not very simple here, I should've told you earlier but...
BOB: As rare as they are, were not supposed to be fond of humans.. Its against his wishes to associate with them.
BOB: It's like almost yesterday where he execu... Nevermind that, lets talk about something else.
sceneoneC: BOB: Well I guess I really cant avoid talking about this can I?.
BOB: It will be difficult but....
BOB: I might have a friend who can help!.
